content: **crochet crown headband for baby and children in drops alpaca** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** 0/1 - 2/4 years head circumference 40/46 - 48/52 cm 15¾ /18 19 /20½ **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 50 g for both sizes color no 6205 light blue 50 g for both sizes color no 0100 off-white drops crochet hook size 4 mm g/6 or size needed to get 18 single_crochet x 20 row with double thread = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 note adhere to vertical crochet gauge otherwise head band will be too large **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b16&d_id=11
